org.apache.juneau.examples.rest.petstore.rest

Interface PetStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PetStoreResource

    @RemoteResource(path="/petstore")
public interface PetStore
    Defines the interface for both the server-side and client-side pet store application.
    • Source

Collection<Pet> findPetsByStatus(@Query(name="status",description="Status values that need to be considered for filter.",required=true,type="array",collectionFormat="csv",items=@Items(type="string",_enum="AVAILABLE,PENDING,SOLD",_default="AVAILABLE"),example="AVALIABLE,PENDING")
                                                                                                     PetStatus[] status)

      • login

        @RemoteMethod(method="GET",
              path="/user/login")
Ok login(@Query(name="username",description="The username for login.",required=true,example="myuser")
                                                                       String username,
                                                                       @Query(name="password",description="The password for login in clear text.",required=true,example="abc123")
                                                                       String password,
                                                                       @ResponseHeader(name="X-Rate-Limit",type="integer",format="int32",description="Calls per hour allowed by the user.",example="123")
                                                                       Value<Integer> rateLimit,
                                                                       Value<ExpiresAfter> expiresAfter,
                                                                       RestRequest req,
                                                                       RestResponse res)
                                                                throws InvalidLogin,
                                                                       NotAcceptable
        User login.
        Parameters:
        username - The username for login.
        password - The password for login in clear text.
        rateLimit - Calls per hour allowed by the user.
        expiresAfter - The Expires-After response header.
        req - The servlet request.
        res - The servlet response.
        Returns:
        Ok if successful.
        Throws:
        InvalidLogin - Login was unsuccessful.
        NotAcceptable - Unsupported Accept header specified.
